title: Understanding Your Ekobol Dashboard
author: Ekobol Product Team
image_alt: Ekobol Dashboard analytics and control center
image_caption: Your command center for real-time e-commerce intelligence.
p1: The Ekobol Dashboard is your centralized control room, designed to provide real-time visibility into every aspect of your e-commerce business. From sales performance to inventory alerts, AI recommendations to marketplace analytics - everything you need is available at a glance. This guide explains each component in detail.
p2: The top row displays critical performance indicators that give you an instant health check of your business.
li1_text: Aggregated sales across all connected marketplaces for the selected time period. Click to see breakdown by platform, category, or product.
li2_text: Number of individual orders processed. Includes all statuses: pending, processing, shipped, delivered. Filter by marketplace or date range.
li3_text: Estimated profit after deducting marketplace fees, shipping costs, and product costs (if configured in inventory settings). Margin percentage shown in parentheses.
li4_text: Percentage of visitors who completed a purchase. Industry benchmark comparison shown with up/down indicator.
li5_text: Mean transaction value. Use this metric to optimize pricing and bundling strategies.
p3: Use the date picker in the top-right to adjust the reporting period:
li6_text: Today: Real-time performance for current day
li10_text: Custom Range: Select specific start and end dates
p4: Pro Tip: Compare periods (e.g., 'This Month vs Last Month') to identify growth trends.
p5: This interactive visualization shows which marketplaces are driving your revenue and how they're trending.
li11_text: Percentage breakdown of sales by marketplace. Hover for exact figures.
li12_text: Side-by-side comparison of revenue, orders, and profit per platform.
li13_text: Trend analysis over time - identify which channels are growing fastest.
li14_text: Detailed data grid with sorting and filtering capabilities.
li15_text: Trendyol Performance: Average order size, return rate, customer ratings
li16_text: Amazon Metrics: Buy Box percentage, FBA vs FBM sales split
li17_text: Etsy Analytics: Shop views, favorite counts, search ranking
li18_text: Hepsiburada Stats: Category performance, sponsored ad ROI
p6: Click any platform name to drill down into product-level performance for that marketplace.
p7: Personalize your dashboard layout by adding, removing, or rearranging widgets.
li19_text: Sales Funnel: Visitor → Cart → Checkout → Purchase conversion stages
li20_text: Top Products: Best sellers by revenue, margin, or quantity sold
li21_text: Geographic Sales Map: Revenue heatmap by city/region
li22_text: Traffic Sources: Organic, paid, social, direct, referral breakdown
li23_text: Customer Segments: New vs returning, high-value vs casual buyers
li24_text: Inventory Turnover: Stock rotation speed by category
li25_text: Return Rate Tracker: Percentage of orders returned, trending data
li26_text: Profit Margin Analysis: Product profitability ranking
li27_text: Click 'Customize Dashboard' button in top-right corner
li28_text: Drag and drop widgets to reposition
li29_text: Click '+' icon to add new widgets from library
li30_text: Click 'x' on widget header to remove
li31_text: Click gear icon on widget to configure settings (date range, filters)
li32_text: Save layout - applies to your user account across all devices
p8: Pro Tip: Create different dashboard layouts for different roles (e.g., 'Sales View', 'Operations View', 'Finance View').
p9: This section highlights time-sensitive items requiring immediate attention.
li33_text: Products below your configured inventory threshold. Shows quantity remaining and estimated days until stockout. Click to create purchase order.
li34_text: Paid orders not yet shipped. Shows order age - prioritize oldest first to meet marketplace SLAs.
li35_text: Unanswered buyer questions. Response time SLA countdown displayed. Direct link to message thread.
li36_text: API connection health for each marketplace. Red indicator = disconnected, yellow = slow, green = healthy.
li37_text: Failed transactions or subscription payment problems. Click for details and resolution steps.
li38_text: New return/refund requests awaiting approval. Shows customer reason and order details.
li39_text: Navigate to Settings → Notifications → Dashboard Alerts
li40_text: Set stock threshold per product or category (e.g., alert at 10 units)
li41_text: Configure alert sounds and desktop notifications
li42_text: Set up email/SMS escalation for critical alerts
p10: Ekobol's AI continuously analyzes your data to identify opportunities and risks.
li43_text: Suggested price adjustments based on competitor analysis and demand elasticity. Show expected revenue impact.
li44_text: Restock recommendations based on sales velocity and seasonal trends. Prevents stockouts and overstock.
li45_text: Keyword suggestions for underperforming listings. Shows search volume and competition level.
li46_text: Products with high conversion but low traffic - recommend ad campaigns.
li47_text: Products with declining sales, increasing return rates, or negative review trends.
li48_text: Frequently bought together product combinations - create bundles to increase AOV.
li49_text: Impact Score: Estimated revenue/profit increase (Low, Medium, High)
li50_text: Effort Required: Implementation complexity (Quick Win, Moderate, Complex)
li51_text: One-Click Actions: Apply suggestion immediately or save for later
li52_text: Historical Performance: Track results of previously applied recommendations
p12: Pro Tip: Focus on 'High Impact, Low Effort' recommendations first for quick wins.
p13: The sidebar provides access to specialized tools and detailed views.
li53_text: Catalog management, bulk editing, variant creation, category organization, image gallery.
li54_text: Order processing, fulfillment workflows, shipment tracking, return management, invoicing.
li55_text: Customer database, lifetime value tracking, segmentation, communication history, loyalty programs.
li56_text: AI ad campaigns, email marketing, discount codes, abandoned cart recovery, social media scheduler.
li57_text: Custom reports, sales trends, profit analysis, forecasting, cohort analysis.
li58_text: Revenue tracking, expense management, profit/loss statements, tax reports, payout history.
li59_text: Stock levels, warehouse management, purchase orders, supplier tracking, COGS calculation.
li60_text: Marketplace connections, shipping carriers, payment gateways, accounting software, CRM systems.
li61_text: Account preferences, team management, billing, API keys, notification config.
p14: Power users can navigate faster with keyboard commands:
li62_text: Ctrl/Cmd + K: Open command palette (universal search)
li65_text: Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + N: Create new product
p15: The dashboard updates automatically as new data arrives from marketplaces.
li67_text: Order sync: Every 5 minutes (configurable: 1, 5, 15, 30 min intervals)
li68_text: Inventory sync: Every 15 minutes to prevent overselling
li70_text: Financial data: Hourly updates for revenue and profit metrics
p16: Manual refresh available - click circular arrow icon in top bar.
p17: Access key metrics on-the-go with Ekobol mobile app (iOS/Android).
li71_text: Simplified KPI cards optimized for small screens
li73_text: Quick actions: Fulfill order, respond to message, update stock
p18: Mobile dashboard syncs with web version - changes reflect across all devices.
li75_text: Limit widgets to 6-8 for optimal load time
li76_text: Use shorter date ranges (30 days vs 12 months)
li77_text: Enable browser caching in Settings → Performance
li78_text: Close unused browser tabs to free memory
li80_text: Reconcile financial data with marketplace payouts
li81_text: Update product costs regularly for accurate profit calculations
li82_text: Check for sync errors in Integrations → Status page
li83_text: Create unlimited dashboard layouts for different use cases
li87_text: Pull dashboard data via REST API for custom analytics
li88_text: Integrate with BI tools (Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio)
li89_text: Build custom widgets with JavaScript SDK
p19: Mastering your dashboard transforms raw data into actionable intelligence. Spend 10 minutes daily reviewing key metrics to stay ahead of trends and opportunities.
help_text: Need help interpreting a specific metric or widget? Our analytics team is available for one-on-one consultations.
